# Changelog

All notable changes to this project are documented in this file.

This project follows [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.1.0/)
and uses [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/).

## [0.1.1] - 2025-12-27

### Added

- Validate inputs and harden Ansible roles

### Documentation

- Generate v0.1.0 release notes
- Add CI checks and documentation

### Maintenance

- Harden `.gitignore` for Ansible secrets and inventories

## [0.1.0] - 2025-12-26

### Added

- Finalized Ansible bootstrap and vault UX

### Maintenance

- Wire up `stackctl` CLI entrypoint
- Add project metadata, development tooling, and documentation
